alert.note: Alert for Harvey; Sedgwick; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 3:47AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Sedgwick, southeastern Harvey and northwestern Sumner Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 346 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Goddard to 6 miles south of Conway Springs. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Newton, Haysville, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Mulvane, Goddard, Maize, Clearwater, Sedgwick, Colwich, Conway Springs, Downtown Wichita, Kechi, Eastborough, West Wichita, Eisenhower National Airport and Northeast Wichita. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 28. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 29 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
